tools.title: Change of Basis Visualizer
tools.summary: A change of basis visualizer for linear transformations.

tools.title: Game Solver
tools.summary: Do you want to remove sudoku from your life? Look no further.

tools.title: Synesthesia: Shred without memorizing scales
tools.summary: Synesthesia allows users to highlight all notes that they want to include while soloing in a guitar-hero-esk style. Great for beginners who don't yet have scales memorized.

tools.title: RGB Axis Visualizer
tools.summary: RGB Axis Visualizer allows users to explore the RGB color space in an interactive way.
